name: payload
description: Path to (IPA, APK, JSON) file, according to the action

name: api_url
description: URL used for connecting to MobSF

name: api_key
description: The API key required by MobSF

name: action
description: The action to be performed by the module

name: hash
description: MD5 hash from an existing scan ("pull_scan" and "export_json")
